welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Northglenn, a charming city known for its friendly residents and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jeffco Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Jeffco Airport caters to private and corporate flights, providing a luxurious and convenient experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Erie Municipal Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Erie Municipal Airport handles all shipments and packages for both domestic and international destinations.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boulder Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Boulder Municipal Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Jeppesen Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Denver International Airport, housing most of the airport's amenities and services.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving primarily United Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving primarily Southwest Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving primarily Delta Air Lines and other international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with the option to upgrade to a faster connection for a fee.
